title: Junior Python Developer - React Experience Needed

steps.description: Understand fundamental Python syntax, data types (integers, strings, booleans, lists, dictionaries), control flow (if/else statements, loops), and basic functions. Get comfortable with the Python interpreter and writing simple scripts.
Learn about classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation.  Understand how to design and implement reusable code using OOP principles.
Explore common data structures like stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, and hash tables.  Implement basic algorithms like sorting and searching. Analyze time and space complexity.

book.name: A Practical Introduction to Python Programming

steps.description: Become familiar with key Python libraries like `requests` (for HTTP requests), `BeautifulSoup` (for web scraping), `pandas` (for data analysis), and `NumPy` (for numerical computing).

book.name: 20 Python Libraries You Aren't Using (But Should)

steps.description: Understand how magic methods (or dunder methods) work and how they can be used to customize the behavior of classes. Learn how to overload operators.

book.name: A Guide to Python's Magic Methods

steps.description: Use Python to automate repetitive tasks. Learn how to work with files, directories, and system commands.

book.name: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python, 3nd Edition: Practical Programming for Total Beginners

steps.description: Gain a basic understanding of statistical learning concepts, including linear regression, classification, and model evaluation.

book.name: An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in Python

steps.description: Learn some common architectural patterns and how to apply them to build robust and scalable applications.
Explore how to interact with Python backends from a React frontend. Learn about REST APIs, data fetching, and state management.

title: React & Python Developer - Entry Level Position

steps.description: Understand Python syntax, data types (integers, floats, strings, booleans), variables, operators, control flow (if/else statements, loops), and basic input/output.  Focus on the core principles. Work through examples from 'A Beginner's Python Tutorial' and 'A Byte of Python'.

Learn about lists, dictionaries, tuples, and sets.  Master defining and using functions, including arguments and return values.  Explore common built-in functions. Continue with 'A Beginner's Python Tutorial' and 'A Byte of Python'.
Grasp the concepts of classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism.  Understand how to create and use custom classes. Review 'A Whirlwind Tour of Python' for a concise introduction to OOP.
Learn how to import and use modules.  Understand how to create and distribute your own packages. Refer to 'A Whirlwind Tour of Python'.
Understand how to handle exceptions and write robust code. Learn how to read from and write to files. Refer to 'Automate the Boring Stuff with Python'.

book.name: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python, 3nd Edition

steps.description: Learn the basics of React, including components, JSX, props, and state. Understand the component lifecycle. Follow a beginner React tutorial online.
Dive deeper into React components, state management (using useState), and event handling. Explore different ways to manage component state.

Explore common Python libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Requests, and Beautiful Soup.  Learn how these libraries can be used to solve real-world problems. Reference '20 Python Libraries You Aren't Using (But Should)' and 'A Practical Introduction to Python Programming'.

book.name: 20 Python Libraries You Aren't Using (But Should)

steps.description: Understand basic statistical concepts and how to apply them using Python libraries. Work through introductory examples from 'An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in Python'.

book.name: An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in Python

steps.description: Understand and use Python's magic methods for customization and extension.

book.name: A Guide to Python's Magic Methods

steps.description: Understand Python syntax, data types, control flow, functions, and basic object-oriented programming.
Dive deeper into Python's core concepts such as modules, packages, exception handling, and file I/O.

book.name: A Practical Introduction to Python Programming

steps.description: Learn to use common Python libraries for tasks like web scraping, data manipulation, and automation.

book.name: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python, 3nd Edition

steps.step: 4. Introduction to Web Development with Flask/Django
steps.description: Build simple web applications using a Python web framework like Flask or Django.
Learn the basics of React, including components, JSX, state, and props.
Build complex React components and learn how to manage state effectively.
Learn how to make API requests from your React front-end to your Python back-end.

book.name: 20 Python Libraries You Aren't Using (But Should)

steps.description: Learn how to use Git for version control and collaboration.
